FROM fdmember a LEFT JOIN fdmemberemail b on b.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq LEFT JOIN fdmemberphone c on c.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq LEFT JOIN fdmemberAddress d on d.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq WHERE 1=1
AND ifmmDelNy = 1 AND ifmmDelNy = 0
AND ifmmId LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%') AND ifmmPassword LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%') AND fdmeEmailFull LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%') AND fdmpNumber LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.ifmmSeq , a.ifmmId , a.ifmmPassword , a.ifmmName , a.ifmmGenderCd , a.ifmmDob , a.ifmmDelNy , a.ifmmSaved , b.fdmeEmailFull , c.fdmpTelecomCd , c.fdmpNumber
, d.fdmaZipcode , d.fdmaTitle1 , d.fdmaTitle2 , d.fdmaAddress , a.ifmmEmailConsentNy , a.ifmmSmsConsentNy , a.regDateTime , a.modDateTime FROM fdmember a LEFT JOIN fdmemberemail b on b.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq LEFT JOIN fdmemberphone c on c.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq LEFT JOIN fdmemberAddress d on d.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq WHERE 1=1 and a.ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq}
SELECT a.ifmmSeq , a.ifmmId , a.ifmmPassword , a.ifmmName FROM fdmember a WHERE 1=1 and a.ifmmId = #{ifmmId} and a.ifmmPassword = #{ifmmPassword}
mapper.update: update fdmember SET ifmmDelNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 and ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM fdmember WHERE 1=1 AND ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq}
